description:
go-tour: add slide about sandbox environment

Also mention rand.Seed.

Fixes issue 108.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour

https://codereview.appspot.com/12741045/diff/1/tour.article
File tour.article (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/12741045/diff/1/tour.article#newcode69
tour.article:69: #appengine: (To see a different number, seed the number generator with [[http://golang.org/pkg/math/rand/#Seed][`rand.Seed`]].)
the usual seed is time, and that won't work either.

On 2013/08/14 21:17:01, r wrote:
> https://codereview.appspot.com/12741045/diff/1/tour.article
> File tour.article (right):
> 
> https://codereview.appspot.com/12741045/diff/1/tour.article#newcode69
> tour.article:69: #appengine: (To see a different number, seed the number
> generator with [[http://golang.org/pkg/math/rand/#Seed][`rand.Seed`]].)
> the usual seed is time, and that won't work either.

That doesn't make the text incorrect.
it does make it unhelpful, though

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/12741045/diff/8001/tour.article
File tour.article (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/12741045/diff/8001/tour.article#newcode87
tour.article:87: #appengine: (To see a different number, seed the number generator with [[http://golang.org/pkg/math/rand/#Seed][`rand.Seed`]].)
s/ with/; see/
or / as described here:/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=3f353c59248f ***

go-tour: add slide about sandbox environment

Also mention rand.Seed.

Fixes issue 108.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12741045

NOT LGTM

prog/sandbox.go does not exist.

> *** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=3f353c59248f
> ***

>
